name: Heura Foods
description: Our mission is to build a net-positive food system by accelerating the protein transition with the ambition of not just being an alternative to current problems but successors by creating value chains that integrate what matters and empowering people to be part of this change.
slogan: We exist to boost a net-positive food system by accelerating the protein transition 🌍🍽🌱 #TheSuccessors
